name: Raccoon's secret
description:
Do we know so well about our smaller brothers? Take raccoons, for example. Can we say that right now they are not plotting something in their burrows right under our feet? This is what you have to find out, taking on the role of an insidious raccoon, whose goal is to steal all the garbage and take it to a secret lair underground, preventing little people from taking it away.

Perhaps raccoons are not as stupid and lazy as they seem, otherwise why would they need all this rubbish ...
